# NSStepperCell

**Class**

An `NSStepperCell` object controls the appearance and behavior of an [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSStepper] object.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class NSStepperCell
```

## Specifying value range

- **maxValue**: The maximum value for the receiver.
- **minValue**: The minimum value for the receiver.
- **increment**: The amount by which the receiver will change per increment or decrement.

## Specifying how stepper cell responds

- **autorepeat**: A Boolean value indicating how the receiver responds to mouse events.
- **valueWraps**: A Boolean value indicating whether the receiver wraps around the minimum and maximum values.

## Inherits From

- NSActionCell

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSAccessibilityElementProtocol
- NSAccessibilityProtocol
- NSCoding
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
- NSUserInterfaceItemIdentification
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
